name: Axebreaker
description: Grants Hit +X and Avo +X in combat against Axes, where X is 20 if Rank B or higher and 30 if Rank A or higher. If an "Sword Prowess" ability is the only "Prowess" ability equipped, and "Axebreaker" is the only "breaker" ability equipped, both abilities consume half-slots. A unit may only equip one "Axebreaker" ability at a time
comment: Items in modifers can either be integers or string expressions
